column1: Table 2. Population of problem-solving court service areas, by type of court, 2012
Report title: Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012 NCJ 249803
Data source: Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012
Authors: Suzanne M. Strong, Ph.D., and Ramona R. Rantala, Tracey Kyckelhahn, Ph.D.
Table 2. Population of problem-solving court service areas, by type of court, 2012
Note: Detail may not sum to total due to rounding.
a/Excludes tribal wellness courts because population of area served was unavailable.
b/Handles alcohol- or drug-dependent offenders also charged with a driving offense.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012 and the U.S. Census Bureau.
